mapper.select: /* SalesOrder.getSalesOrders */ SELECT 'JUPITER' AS SenderBusinessSystemName -- JUPITER /* 주문 기본 정보 */ ,so.sales_order_number AS PurchaseOrderByCustomer -- 주문번호 ,'TA' AS SalesOrderType ,'3100' AS SalesOrganization ,CASE WHEN sou.store_id = #{mismatchStoreJupiter} THEN 20 ELSE 10 END AS DistributionChannel ,CASE -- 주문유형 WHEN so.sales_order_type = 'GENERAL_ORDER' THEN 'ZOM' -- 일반주문 ELSE 'ZSO' -- 정기구매 END AS ZSalesType -- ,'INC11485' AS SoldToParty ,bl.belong_store_login_id AS SoldToParty ,DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(ob.outbound_datetime, so.approval_datetime), '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s') AS RequestedDeliveryDate -- 미 출고지시건들은 배송요청일 없음 ,DATE_FORMAT(so.order_datetime, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s') AS CustomerPurchaseOrderDate ,DATE_FORMAT(so.approval_datetime, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s') AS SalesOrderDate ,CASE WHEN sop.payment_type = 'CREDIT_CARD' AND sop.total_point > 0 AND sop.total_coupon_discount_amount = 0 THEN '24' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'CREDIT_CARD' AND sop.total_point = 0 AND sop.total_coupon_discount_amount > 0 THEN '25' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'CREDIT_CARD' AND sop.total_point > 0 AND sop.total_coupon_discount_amount > 0 THEN '26' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'SIMPLE_PAYMENT' AND sop.total_point > 0 AND sop.total_coupon_discount_amount = 0 THEN '27' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'SIMPLE_PAYMENT' AND sop.total_point = 0 AND sop.total_coupon_discount_amount > 0 THEN '28' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'SIMPLE_PAYMENT' AND sop.total_point > 0 AND sop.total_coupon_discount_amount > 0 THEN '29' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'AUTO_PAYMENT' AND sop.total_point > 0 AND sop.total_coupon_discount_amount = 0 THEN '30' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'AUTO_PAYMENT' AND sop.total_point = 0 AND sop.total_coupon_discount_amount > 0 THEN '31' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'AUTO_PAYMENT' AND sop.total_point > 0 AND sop.total_coupon_discount_amount > 0 THEN '32' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'CREDIT_CARD' THEN '11' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'SIMPLE_PAYMENT' THEN '19' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'AUTO_PAYMENT' THEN '17' WHEN sop.payment_type = 'POINT' THEN '13' END AS AdditionalCustomerGroup3 ,bl.belong_branch_login_id as ZBINC ,bl.belong_center_login_id as ZTINC ,NULL AS ZRECOM ,NULL AS ZGRECOM /* 배송비 정보 */ ,CASE WHEN sop.delivery_fee_amount > 0 THEN 'ZDC1' ELSE '' END AS DeliveryType -- 배송비 유형 ,ROUND(sop.delivery_fee_amount / 1.1) AS DeliveryRateValue -- 배송비 /* 쿠폰 정보 */ ,'ZCP1' AS CouponType -- 가격유형 ,ROUND(sop.total_coupon_discount_amount / 1.1) AS CouponRateValue -- 쿠폰할인금액 ,'ZDC2' AS CouponVatType -- 쿠폰 VAT 유형 ,ROUND(sop.total_coupon_discount_amount / 1.1 * 0.1) AS CouponRateVatValue -- 쿠폰할인금액 VAT /** 부가 정보 */ ,so.sales_order_id FROM `jupiter-order`.sales_order so INNER JOIN `jupiter-order`.sales_order_user sou ON so.sales_order_id = sou.sales_order_id INNER JOIN `jupiter-member`.consumer cs ON sou.user_id = cs.user_id INNER JOIN `jupiter-member`.belong bl ON cs.consumer_id = bl.consumer_id INNER JOIN `jupiter-order`.sales_order_payment sop ON so.sales_order_id = sop.sales_order_id INNER JOIN `jupiter-order`.sales_order_delivery sod ON so.sales_order_id = sod.sales_order_id LEFT JOIN `jupiter-order`.outbound ob ON so.sales_order_id = ob.sales_order_id AND ob.delete_yn = 'N' WHERE so.delete_yn = 'N' /** SALES_ORDER_COMPLETE(구매확정) : 주문생성 SALES_ORDER_CANCEL(결제취소) : 배치 스케줄 주문생성, 주문취소 JOB이 동시에 도는 경우로 인하여 주문취소 단계이지만 주문생성을 먼저 동작하기 위함 (출고지시) : 녹여져 있음으로 관여 X */ AND CASE WHEN so.sales_order_status = 'SALES_ORDER_CANCEL' THEN 1 WHEN so.sales_order_status = 'SALES_ORDER_COMPLETE' AND so.outbound_yn = 'N' THEN 1 -- 변경 출고전 결제완료 주문 ELSE 0 END = 1 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `erp-system`.if_sales_order iso WHERE so.sales_order_number = iso.purchase_order_by_customer) AND so.order_datetime between #{startDatetime} and #{endDatetime}

/* SalesOrder.getSalesOrderItems */ SELECT (row_number() over(order by pi.product_id)) * 10 as SalesOrderItem ,pi.product_id ,pi.Material ,pi.RequestedQuantity ,'EA' as RequestedQuantityUnit ,'N' as deliveryFlag FROM ( SELECT so.sales_order_id ,coalesce(pk_pd.product_id, pd.product_id) AS product_id ,coalesce(pk_pd.product_code, pd.product_code) AS Material ,coalesce(pk.count * sopd.quantity, sopd.quantity) AS RequestedQuantity FROM `jupiter-order`.sales_order so INNER JOIN `jupiter-order`.sales_order_user sou ON so.sales_order_id = sou.sales_order_id INNER JOIN `jupiter-order`.sales_order_payment sop ON so.sales_order_id = sop.sales_order_id INNER JOIN `jupiter-order`.sales_order_delivery sod ON so.sales_order_id = sod.sales_order_id INNER JOIN `jupiter-order`.sales_order_product sopd ON so.sales_order_id = sopd.sales_order_id INNER JOIN `jupiter-product`.product pd ON sopd.product_id = pd.product_id LEFT JOIN `jupiter-product`.package pk ON pd.product_id = pk.product_id LEFT JOIN `jupiter-product`.product pk_pd ON pk.composite_product_id = pk_pd.product_id WHERE sopd.delete_yn = 'N' AND so.sales_order_id = #{salesOrderId} ) pi GROUP BY pi.sales_order_id ,pi.product_id

/* SalesOrder.getSalesOrderPayments */ SELECT row_number() over(order by payment_table.sales_order_payment_id) AS ZSequence ,payment_table.ZPaymentMethod ,payment_table.ZAmount ,payment_table.ZCurrency FROM ( SELECT /* 결제정보 */ sop.sales_order_payment_id ,sop.payment_type as ZPaymentMethod ,sop.total_amount as ZAmount ,'KRW' as ZCurrency FROM `jupiter-order`.sales_order_payment sop WHERE sop.payment_type != 'POINT' AND sop.sales_order_id = #{salesOrderId} UNION ALL SELECT /* 결제정보 */ sop.sales_order_payment_id ,'POINT' as ZPaymentMethod ,sop.total_point as ZAmount ,'KRW' as ZCurrency FROM `jupiter-order`.sales_order_payment sop WHERE sop.total_point > 0 AND sop.sales_order_id = #{salesOrderId} ) AS payment_table
